raw akas.title: Die Abenteuer von Chuck und seinen Freunden

akas: The Adventures of Chuck & Friends (original title)
Die Abenteuer von Chuck und seinen Freunden Germany
akas from release info: The Adventures of Chuck & Friends (original title)
Die Abenteuer von Chuck und seinen Freunden Germany

1.title: Rowdy's New Rigg/Grandpa Treadwell

episode of.title: The Adventures of Chuck & Friends (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: Rowdy doesn't feel part of a construction project, thinking his friends have better abilities. Chuck and his pals refurbish a machine to help Rowdy, but Rowdy realizes that he already has unique talents. /Chuck's Grandpa visits for a truck show, and Chuck and his buddies train him in hopes of winning. But Grandpa shows that speed, strength and looks aren't the only things that make you a winner.

2.title: Super-Sweeper-Chuck/Sitter Shenanigans

episode of.title: The Adventures of Chuck & Friends (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Chuck and his pals decide to build a super sweeper machine to clean up the truck stop, but they forget to clean up after themselves! /Haulie and Porter leave Chuck and his pals with Dahlia, a babysitter, and the youngsters take advantage of her good nature to play in ways they're not normally allowed... until things get a little bit out of control.

3.title: The Legend of Bigtire/Hard at Work

episode of.title: The Adventures of Chuck & Friends (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Chuck is a smart, adventurous, creative, funny dreamer and doer with the world at his wheels! Chuck and his friends push the limits, of their imagination and what they can build and do, with great adventures, which always end with a lesson learned and the kid trucks totally covered in mud! THE ADVENTURES OF CHUCK AND FRIENDS is all about rugged action, the thrill of discovery, big adventures, and most of all, having fun with your friends. Turn the key, floor the accelerator, and get your imagination into high gear as we zoom along with Chuck!

4.title: Chuck's Back Up/Speed Indeed

episode of.title: The Adventures of Chuck & Friends (TV Series 2010– )

5.title: Uncle Vertie's Stunt School/Dancing Wheels

episode of.title: The Adventures of Chuck & Friends (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: Chuck's Uncle Vertie teaches Chuck and his friends a new trick on the half-pipe, but if Chuck wants to perform it in the upcoming stunt show, he must practice, practice, practice! /A girl truck named Chassie tries to get Chuck and his buddies to help with a dance routine, but Chuck thinks dancing's not for them. At least, not until Chassie's dance moves solve a racing problem for Chuck!

6.title: Keep on Trackin'/The Bully

episode of.title: The Adventures of Chuck & Friends (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: To earn a scouting badge, Chuck and his pals track down a list of hidden items around Treadwells, but Chuck and Flip end up turning the fun search into a mean-spirited one-on-one competition. /Chuck and his buddies ask a visiting Crane Truck to help them build a slide onto the clubhouse. But instead of helping, the young visitor ends up breaking things and being disruptive.

1.title: Special Delivery/Buffing Up

episode of.title: The Adventures of Chuck & Friends (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: Chuck is eager to help out around the truck stop but he may need a little support from his friends. / Looking to avoid a future breakdown, Chuck exercises to the extreme.

imdb.title: The Adventures of Chuck & Friends
plot: Chuck is a dump truck him and his freinds have fun together and with the world famous monster truck rally. Chucks brother

Chuck and his friends push the limits, of their imagination and what they can build and do, with great adventures, which always end with a lesson learned and the kid trucks totally covered in mud! THE ADVENTURES OF CHUCK AND FRIENDS is all about rugged action, the thrill of discovery, big adventures, and most of all, having fun with your friends.
